name: Endless Fury
description: Call down lightning to strike an enemy, dealing 871 Shock Damage.  If the enemy falls to or below 20% Health within 4 seconds of being struck, an explosion deals an additional 3195 Shock Damage to them and 696 Shock Damage to other enemies nearby.  If any enemy is killed within 5 seconds of being hit with this ability, you restore 4860 Magicka.
effectLines: Restores Magicka if the target dies after this ability dealt damage to them.

If the enemy falls to or below 20% Health within 4 seconds of being struck, an explosion deals an additional $2 Shock Damage to them and $3 Shock Damage to other enemies nearby.  If any enemy is killed within 5 seconds of being hit with this ability, you restore 4860 Magicka.
